text: Cristal Camden (born Cristal Cichowski on September 7, 1981) is a model who dated Playboy founder Hugh Hefner in 2003. She has appeared on the television show The Girls Next Door. Camden was the Playboy Cyber Girl of the Week for May 7, 2007. She sometimes is credited as Crystal Camden. She was born in San Jose, California. ==External links== * Category:People from San Jose, California Category:1981 births Category:Living people
title: Cristal Camden
